verses.translation: Say, He is Allah, [who is] One
verses.gestureDescription: Point index finger upward to signify Oneness
Palms facing forward to show eternal presence

verses.translation: He neither begets nor is born
verses.gestureDescription: Hands moving apart to signify negation

verses.transliteration: Wa lam yakun lahu kufuwan aḥad
verses.translation: Nor is there to Him any equivalent
verses.gestureDescription: Fingertips touching to show equality concept
